message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of something around $12,000. Could you consider that?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the value of this product is quite significant. Could you consider $13,000?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Could you consider $12,500?
